1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>WHAT <break time='200ms'/> WE <break time='200ms'/> DO <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Sumudu : Harini, I get up at 5 o'clock. At what time do you get up?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme>, <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> up <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> 5 <break time='200ms'/> o'clock. <break time='200ms'/> At <break time='200ms'/> what <break time='200ms'/> time <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> up? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Harini : I get up at 4.45 a.m. and my mother gets up at 4.30 a.m. I help my mother to make tea.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> up <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> 4.45 <break time='200ms'/> a.m. <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> gets <break time='200ms'/> up <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> 4.30 <break time='200ms'/> a.m. <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> help <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> tea. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Sumudu : My mother gets up at 4 o'clock. She makes tea and wakes me up. My sister and I help her to cook.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> My <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> gets <break time='200ms'/> up <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> 4 <break time='200ms'/> o'clock. <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> makes <break time='200ms'/> tea <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> wakes <break time='200ms'/> me <break time='200ms'/> up. <break time='200ms'/> My <break time='200ms'/> sister <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> help <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> cook. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: Harini : We too help our mother to cook. I peel onions and my father scrapes coconut.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> too <break time='200ms'/> help <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> cook. <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> peel <break time='200ms'/> onions <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> father <break time='200ms'/> scrapes <break time='200ms'/> coconut. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Sumudu : I worship Lord Buddha and then study for some time.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> worship <break time='200ms'/> Lord <break time='200ms'/> Buddha <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> then <break time='200ms'/> study <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> some <break time='200ms'/> time. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Harini : We offer flowers to god Ganesh and pray.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> offer <break time='200ms'/> flowers <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> god <break time='200ms'/> Ganesh <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> pray. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.text: Sumudu : Our school bus comes at 6.30 a.m. So I get ready and have my breakfast. My sister and I worship our parents and leave home.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Our <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> bus <break time='200ms'/> comes <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> 6.30 <break time='200ms'/> a.m. <break time='200ms'/> So <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> ready <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> breakfast. <break time='200ms'/> My <break time='200ms'/> sister <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> worship <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> parents <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> leave <break time='200ms'/> home. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.text: Harini : I walk to school with my mother and brother. We too worship our parents.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> walk <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> brother. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> too <break time='200ms'/> worship <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> parents. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

12.text: Read the role play and answer the questions.
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> role <break time='200ms'/> play <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> answer <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> questions. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

13.text: 1. At what time does Sumudu get up? 2. Who helps her mother to make tea? 3. When does Sumudu leave home? 4. How does Harini go to school? 5. How do you help your parents? e.g. :- I scrape coconut and ......
13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> At <break time='200ms'/> what <break time='200ms'/> time <break time='200ms'/> does <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> up? <break time='200ms'/> 2. <break time='200ms'/> Who <break time='200ms'/> helps <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> tea? <break time='200ms'/> 3. <break time='200ms'/> When <break time='200ms'/> does <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> leave <break time='200ms'/> home? <break time='200ms'/> 4. <break time='200ms'/> How <break time='200ms'/> does <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> go <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> school? <break time='200ms'/> 5. <break time='200ms'/> How <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> help <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> parents? <break time='200ms'/> e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> scrape <break time='200ms'/> coconut <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> ...... <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
